channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Shadow in the Cloud
channel.desc: A WWII pilot is assigned a secret mission to travel with confidential documents on a Boeing B-17 Flying Fortress. However, she soon has to deal with an evil presence on board.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Awakening the Zodiac
channel.desc: After getting hold of a film reel depicting two gruesome murders, a couple approach the police to identify the killer, leading them down a dangerous path.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Uncaged
channel.desc: A sleepwalking teen attaches a camera to himself at night. Later, he finds out a dark secret about his family from the footage.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Midnight Special
channel.desc: Alton has strange powers. His dad, Roy, takes him from a cult. The government also wants him. They all chase Roy and Alton to a destiny date.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Redbelt
channel.desc: A ju-jitsu instructor, Mike Terry, who tries to make ends meet, refuses to compete in the ring. He is forced to return to the ring in order to raise money after his debts mount.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Rising Shaolin: The Protector
channel.desc: A man is given shelter by a monk from a long-lost Shaolin Temple after he is framed for murder. However, things take an unusual turn when the monk is murdered.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Universal Soldier 4
channel.desc: After waking up from a coma, John vows to kill the man responsible for the death of his wife and daughter. However, his vengeance leads him to encounter a terrifying army of reanimated supersoldiers.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Producers
channel.desc: A ruined producer schemes with his neurotic accountant to create the world's worst movie and pocket the surplus, offering them a chance to get rich quickly.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Life
channel.desc: As astronauts discover the first evidence of extra-terrestrial life on Mars, they begin realising that the life form is extremely intelligent and hostile.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Knights of the Zodiac
channel.desc: Teenager Seiya makes a living fighting on the streets while searching for his kidnapped sister. However, his life changes when he taps into mystical powers he never knew he had.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Kidnap
channel.desc: Whilst discussing a custody battle with her lawyer, a mother witnesses the abduction of her son and chases after the kidnappers against all odds.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Jerry Maguire
channel.desc: Sports agent Jerry Maguire tries to get back on his feet after being fired from his job. However, the only client he has is Rod Tidwell, a disgruntled football player who wants a better contract.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Lawless
channel.desc: Three siblings operate an illegal moonshine business using their restaurant as a front. Things take a turn when the oldest brother, Forrest, refuses to pay a bribe to a corrupt lawman.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days
channel.desc: Stella Olemaun moves to Los Angeles to create awareness about vampires, but soon becomes the target of the local blood-thirsty demons. She decides to face them and avenge her husband's death.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Surf's Up
channel.desc: Followed by a documentary film crew, Cody Maverick, a 17-year-old penguin, travels from Antarctica to Pen Gu Island hoping to win the Big Z Memorial Surf Off.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Fog
channel.desc: When supernatural events occur in their town, Nick and Elizabeth discover that the ghosts of a crew of sailors who were killed in a shipwreck more than 100 years ago have come to exact revenge.
